common: Zones are approximate - adjust based on decor placement
Ensure basking area has unobstructed path to UVB lighting
arboreal: Maximize vertical climbing space with branches and plants
Provide multiple horizontal perches at mid/upper levels; White's Tree Frogs prefer resting on horizontal branches
Use solid-sided (glass/PVC) enclosures with top ventilation to retain humidity and temperature; avoid full-screen walls
terrestrial: Focus on horizontal floor space with varied terrain
